Media.MediaTitle: Late Effects - Cumulative incidence curves of nonsurgical premature menopause

Diagnoses.Diagnosis: long-term effects secondary to cancer therapy in children

ContentDescriptions.ContentDescription: Graph showing cumulative incidence curves of nonsurgical premature menopause in survivors (solid line) compared with siblings (broken line). The y axis indicates Not Menopausal in 95% confidence intervals. The x axis indicates Age (Years).

Captions.MediaCaption: Figure 4: Cumulative incidence curves of nonsurgical premature menopause in survivors (solid line) compared with siblings (broken line). Vertical bars indicate 95% confidence intervals. Sklar C A et al. JNCI J Natl Cancer Inst 2006;98:890-896. Â© The Author 2006. Published by Oxford University Press.

ProposedUse.Summary: Late Effects of Treatment for Childhood Cancer
